snippet: Lance Armstrong was remorseful but detached during his interview with Oprah Winfrey, depriving viewers of a poignant watershed moment in a fallen sports hero’s betrayal.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column says Lance Armstrong deprived viewers by expressing little emotion during his interview with Oprah Winfrey.
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong was remorseful but detached during his interview with Oprah Winfrey, depriving viewers of a poignant watershed moment in a fallen sports hero’s betrayal.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong Interview With Oprah Winfrey Lacked Emotion
headline.main: Dispassionate End to a Crumbled American Romance
headline.print_headline: Dispassionate End to a Crumbled Romance
